localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The app calculates well-known SaaS metrics from your subscriptions data in Google Sheets. Prepare your data in a recognized format. Include Customer ID, start date, end date and monthly value of subscriptions. Once you have it ready you can calculate SaaS-related subscriptions based on it.
blogPost.body: The app calculates well-known SaaS metrics from your subscriptions data in Google Sheets. Prepare your data in a recognized format. Include Customer ID, start date, end date and monthly value of subscriptions. Once you have it ready you can calculate SaaS-related subscriptions based on it.
blogPost.title: Probe - Calculate your SaaS metrics with one click in Google Sheets
blogPost.author: Aliaksei Kulbei

localize.description: 该应用程序根据您在Google Sheet中的订阅数据计算出知名的SaaS指标。以可识别的格式准备数据。包括订阅的客户ID、开始日期、结束日期和月值。一旦准备就绪，您就可以根据它计算与SaaS相关的订阅量。
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets中单击一下即可计算您的SaaS指标

localize.description: 該應用程序根據您在Google Sheet中的訂閱數據計算出知名的SaaS指標。以可識別的格式準備數據。包括訂閱的客戶ID、開始日期、結束日期和月值。一旦準備就緒，您就可以根據它計算與SaaS相關的訂閱量。
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets中單擊一下即可計算您的SaaS指標
